mapper.sql: id, owner_id, address, area_size, serv_life, pub_date, layout, desc, area_id, tag_id, examine_type,price,detail_desc
mapper.select: SELECT house.*, `user`.username owner, tag.name tag FROM house LEFT JOIN `user` ON house.`owner_id`=`user`.id LEFT JOIN tag ON house.tag_id = tag.id WHERE house.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into house (id, owner_id, address, area_size, serv_life, pub_date, layout, desc, area_id, tag_id, examine_type, price) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{servLife,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pubDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{layout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examineType,jdbcType=INTEGER}),#{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update house
owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

examine_type = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update house set owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_size = #{areaSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, serv_life = #{servLife,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pub_date = #{pubDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, layout = #{layout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tag_id = #{tagId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, examine_type = #{examineType,jdbcType=INTEGER} price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
